metadata.reset: If your Wi-Fi hub is frozen and unresponsive, inset a pin into the Reset hole. If you want to clear the location, Tap My Devices and Scroll the screen to the left or right to select a location. Tap →Edit and use the following option. Location name→REMOVE PLACE. If you reset the Wi-Fi hub, you should exclude the Z-Wave device and re-include it. For instructions on how to exclude Z-Wave devices, refer respective Z-Wave device’s user manual.
